entry.summary: 摩根大通在一份研究报告中表示，上海升级将提高以太坊的质押率。考虑到其他 PoS 网络的平均质押率大约是以太坊的四倍，14% 的比例还有很大的上升空间。该银行还认为，未来抵押增加的很大一部分可能会转向 Lido 等流动性抵押协议。（CoinDesk） https://www.coindesk.com/tech/2023/02/09/jpmorgan-ethereums-shanghai-upgrade-to-raise-staking-toward-proof-of-stake-blockchain-average/?utm_medium=social&utm_source=onecryptofeed&utm_campaign=headlines

Martin Köppelmann 🇺🇦: Can a DAO sell 10k ETH without trusting a market maker or getting rekt by sandwich bots? The answer is yes! Just ~15m ago @ENS_DAO sold 10k ETH for $16.226m via @CoWSwap. With a slippage tolerance of 0.5% $80k could have been stolen via MEV but it was fully protected!

entry.summary: 纽约加密交易平台 EminiFX CEO 将承认参与涉嫌 5900 万美元庞氏骗局的罪名。他于 2022 年 5 月被捕，并被指控犯有电汇欺诈和商品欺诈罪，最初对此拒不不认罪。他曾通过向投资者提供虚假的账户报表显示他们的投资每周增长 5% 至 10% 来继续这个骗局。（CoinDesk） https://www.coindesk.com/policy/2023/02/08/eminifx-ceo-eddy-alexandre-set-to-plead-guilty-to-role-in-alleged-59m-ponzi-scheme/?utm_medium=referral&utm_source=rss&utm_campaign=headlines

entry.summary:
It's fun to go back and pull up some moon math for $jpeg. $2B TVL at 50% borrow rate = $1B loans $1B loans at 5% borrow rate = $50M $50M x 20x = $1B market cap Pretty straightforward.
